titleStmt.title: Memorials of the English affairs, or, An historical account of what passed from the beginning of the reign of King Charles the First, to King Charles the Second his happy restauration containing the publick transactions, civil and military : together with the private consultations and secrets of the cabinet.
titleStmt.author: Whitlocke, Bulstrode, 1605-1675 or 6.

titleStmt.title: Memorials of the English affairs, or, An historical account of what passed from the beginning of the reign of King Charles the First, to King Charles the Second his happy restauration containing the publick transactions, civil and military : together with the private consultations and secrets of the cabinet.
titleStmt.author: Whitlocke, Bulstrode, 1605-1675 or 6.
Anglesey, Arthur Annesley, Earl of, 1614-1686.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Bulstrode Whitlocke. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
"Published by Arthur, Earl of Anglesea, who took considerable liberties with the ms." -- Lowndes, Bibliographer's manual.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
